Question & Options:
What are the relationships among Gina, Easy Day, and the Expendables in the context of their mission?
Options:
A. A) Gina is a replacement for Easy Day in the team.
B. B) Easy Day is a member of the Expendables.
C. C) The Expendables are deployed to Libya.
D. D) Easy Day is the leader of the Expendables.
Correct Answer: A) Gina is a replacement for Easy Day in the team., B) Easy Day is a member of the Expendables., C) The Expendables are deployed to Libya.
